songInfo.album: from The Very Best Of T-Bone Walker (Koch International 8066) ,

lyrics.l: You know I love you, can't stand the way you do
You know I love you, can't stand the way you do
Well, you tellin' me it's true now, an that's alright for you
Sometimes I wonder, why don't you write to me?
Sometimes I wonder, why don't you write to me?
If I've been a bad fellow, I didn't intend to be
Baby baby, come back home to me
Baby baby, come back home to me
You know I love ya baby, my old time 'used to be'
